name: Ping Pong Evolution
short_description:
This is a recreation of the most epic game, Ping Pong. It's now in early alpha. Features:
- Power-ups!
- Multiplayer on same computer!
- Singleplayer versus a bot! (Simple but kinda hard for new players ;D)
- More to come!

DISCONTINUED FOR UNORIGINALITY AND INTEREST TO CONTINUE.
summary: Ping pong recreation with new features. DISCONTINUED
